p.line: Without trying this in Snap!,try to answer the following question:
What does the following set of scripts do when the _CODES_Turn1_CODEE_ message is broadcast?
The sprite says "Go!" and then "Team!" and then stops.
The sprite repeatedly says "Go!" and then "Team!" until you hit the red Stop button.
Nothing happens - the script does not work.
The sprite says "Go!" and then "Team!", repeating a few times, and then stops by itself.

content.hint: The two blocks take turns to call each other infinitely.
